name: AssignedProductTerm
comment: This reference entity stores list of terms that are applied to the Product Offerings like 12 months, 24 months etc.Term basically refers to the condition under which a Product Offering is made available to Customers. Cuurently this is only defined for Commitment Term.
vf short description: This reference entity stores list of terms that are applied to the Product Offerings like 12 months, 24 months etc.Term basically refers to the condition under which a Product Offering is made available to Customers.

fields.name: AssignedProductTermSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: AssignedProductTermKey
fields.comment: Uniquely identifies the assigned product offer term. Generated Key based on Assigned Product Key and Assigned Product Offering Term Id

fields.name: AssignedProductSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: AssignedProductTermId
fields.comment: Uniquely identifies the assigned product offer term. product.productTerm.name

fields.name: AssignedProductTermName
fields.comment: The assigned product offering term name. productOffering.productOfferingTerm.displayName.value where productOffering.productOfferingTerm.displayName.locale = "en-US"

fields.name: AssignedProductTermDesc
fields.comment: The assigned product offering term description. product.productTerm.description

fields.name: AssignedProductTermTypeInd
fields.comment: Indicates the assigned product offering term type such as Commitment. product.productTerm.type

fields.name: AssignedProductTermDuration
fields.comment: Indicates the assigned product offering term duration. product.productTerm.duration.amount

fields.name: AssignedProductTermDurationUomInd
fields.comment: Indicates the assigned product offering term duration uom such as Months, Weeks and so on. product.productTerm.duration.units

fields.name: PolicyId
fields.comment: Indicates the policy related to the assigned product offering term. product.productTerm.policy

fields.name: AssignedProductTermFreezeDate
fields.comment: The time in which the term is frozen product.productTerm.freezeDate

fields.name: AssignedProductTermImpactTypeInd
fields.comment: The type of the impact on the term of the assigned product due to some action performed on the assigned product product.productTerm.impactType

fields.name: AssignedProductTermRemainingDuration
fields.comment: Indicates the assigned product offering term remaining duration. product.productTerm.remainingDuration.amount

fields.name: AssignedProductTermElapsedDuration
fields.comment: Indicates the assigned product offering term elapsed duration. product.productTerm.elapsedDuration.amount

fields.name: EffectiveDate
fields.comment: The effective date of the assigned product term. product.productTerm.validFor.fromDate

fields.name: ExpirationDate
fields.comment: The expiration date of the assigned product term. product.productTerm.validFor.toDate

fields.name: AssignedProductId
fields.comment: Identifies the assigned product in the source system. Product.productId

fields.name: AssignedProductVersionId
fields.comment: Indicates the version Identifer of the assigned product. Product.version

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
